Well um I we just recently graduated from Rice University and uh we were going through lot of job interviews and things and some of the things that were important to me uh when my husband was looking for his job was um hours you know we - hed been in graduate school so I was used to his not being home at all
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah
turns.label: b

turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- you know even on the weekends and um and things So that was important to me and also insurance for the fa- our family --
Sure
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- because wed like to be able to take care of our medical needs and not be thinking so much about whether or not you can afford it
Yeah I dont ever want to have to worry about that Thats real important to me Um you know we have that that Aetna --

turns.text: uh-huh

Well thats nice

uh-huh thats good
turns.label: b

turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh

Yes Yes its pretty bad Well yeah and we um we were interested in having dental insurance too because um having been in school we kind of put things off --

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

Do

Do you have the basic plan or do you have the the other one
We have um you know - were at Aetna with an uh ex- - we have like the medi- the dental insurance is separate Is that what you mean

uh-huh

turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- thats not that bad
No thats great Yeah we need to go shopping for dentists and things like that too Yes and lets see besides insurance other things that we looked at um - well my husband does not like to commute --

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

No we dont like that either

uh-huh uh-huh

Oh thats not bad

turns.label: sd

uh-huh thats true Thats really important Um also what um opportunities there would be for advancement I think we looked at besides just you know what salary you would be having now But when when could uh your salary increase --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Right
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- um is there was there somewhere to go
turns.label: sd

turns.label: b

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

Yes that we can make our mortgage payments and yeah thats really true
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Uh one of the drawbacks I think of working for big company is often times you do have to follow pretty rigid um guidelines um if if an employee is especially exemplary I think its often - in smaller company its little bit easier for them to say Hey you know this person did wonderful job give him big bonus kind of thing lot of times --
uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- smaller companies have bonus plans where I think in large company its hard to do that because therere just so many people to deal with --
uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and you have to have guidelines you know for salary increases and things like that thats one of the things that that happens when someone when youre dealing with large company

Right slash error

How long has he been in his present position
Oh just since last summer

turns.text: You never know were hoping that that wont be the case We I think one of the most deciding factors of why we chose um this area is that um my husband was raised in Irving --

turns.text: uh-huh
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- and so he we have lot of family here his side of the family And being - when we were down in Houston we were isolated I mean its not that far but people would ha- - we didnt have anyone in town that was our family
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Right
turns.label: b

turns.text: And although we had really good friends and we had church and school support and things um we were anxious to move close to family members just because we wanted our children to know their grandparents and things like that
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah Were very -
turns.label: b

turns.text: So that really made big difference I think in why we chose I and chose to move this way
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Were very far from our families and its really hard I have little children and um they were the only grandchildren and so our our families are are really far away In fact this is little off the topic but yesterday my mother happened to be on train going from Phoenix to back to Chicago --

turns.text: uh-huh

Yeah and it is I think it is important to you know want to be close to your family and -

Yeah thats the same
its nice

Its nice that you can have your family close like that
